Introduction

Hwayeon (화연), formerly known as Suhyeon, is a South Korean singer under Four Go Entertainment. She used to be a member of the girl group ShaFLA, and a former member of 1PS under the stage name Yena. She made her solo debut on May 1, 2022 with the single ‘꽃핀다’.
